title: Comparative Study of Planning Law and Compensation Rights: Learning Through International Case Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners analyze the correlation between urban planning laws and compensation rights systems via cross-national case comparisons. Conducted through a hybrid approach combining online research and offline discussion sessions.

learning_goals: Systematically analyze the strengths and weaknesses of planning laws by comparing compensation right systems across 13 countries
Explain methodologies for cross-country comparative research using a pre-developed legal scenario framework
Evaluate international differences in legal responses to land value fluctuations and propose actionable improvements applicable to the learner’s home country system
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
